original_text: Then was king Belshazzar greatly troubled, and his countenance was changed in him, and his lords were astonied.
korean_text: 그러므로 벨사살 왕이 크게 번민하여 그의 얼굴빛이 변하였고 귀족들도 다 놀라니라

sentences.original_text: Then was king Belshazzar greatly troubled
sentences.korean_translation: 그 때 벨사살 왕은 크게 두려워했습니다

sentences.original_text: and his countenance was changed in him
